cause.description:
If CHL holders could carry on campus, we all would be much, much, safer.
1. The Second Amendment should not be limited.
2. Citizens must be able to protect THEMSELVES, not wait on "authorities" to do so.
3. An armed society is a polite society. Manners are good when one may have to back up his acts with his life. - Robert A. Heinlein
cause.name: Allow Defensive Firearms on Campus
